革.definition: animal hide; leather; to reform; to remove; to expel (from office)

革吉.definition: Ge'gyai county in Ngari prefecture, Tibet, Tibetan: Dge rgyas rdzong

革吉縣.definition: Ge'gyai county in Ngari prefecture, Tibet, Tibetan: Dge rgyas rdzong

革命.definition: to withdraw the mandate of heaven (and transition to a new dynasty) (original meaning); revolution; revolutionary; to revolt (against sb or sth); to revolutionize (sth); (separable verb sometimes used in the pattern 革noun的命); CL:次[ci4]

革故鼎新.definition: to discard the old and introduce the new (idiom); to innovate

革職.definition: to sack; to remove from a position; to depose

革蘭氏.definition: Mr Gram; Dr. Hans Christian Jaochim Gram (1953-1938), Danish doctor and inventor of the Gram stain 革蘭氏染色法|革兰氏染色法

革蘭氏染色法.pinyin: gé lán shì rǎn sè fǎ
革蘭氏染色法.definition: Gram stain (used to distinguished two different kinds of bacteria)

革蘭氏陰性.definition: Gram negative (bacteria that do not retain Gram stain, often the more dangerous kind)

革除.definition: to eliminate; to expel; to abolish

革面洗心.definition: lit. to renew one's face and wash one's heart (idiom); to repent sincerely and mend one's mistaken ways; to turn over a new leaf
